title: Lynda - Type Project: Punk Album Art with Nigel French
description:

Learn how to create a punk album cover in this Type Project. Designer Nigel French introduces to you the origins of punkÃ¢â‚¬â€the 1970s movement defined by its DIY, anti-establishment attitudeÃ¢â‚¬â€and then shows how to create album art inspired by the original aesthetic. This technique reinterprets an iconic image using Photoshop's layers, layer masks, and clipping masks, and then combines the results with custom "ransom-note" type in Illustrator
